started.title: Finish setting up Workspace details
started.desc: Workspace information set up is complete. Invite Members to start using VIRNECT products at Workspace.

setting.title: Profile settings
setting.name: Workspace name
setting.nameComment: Enter less than 30 characters for your workspace name.
setting.descComment: Describe it using less than 40 letters.
setting.imageComment:
• Update your Workspace profile image.
  • Profile picture is displayed on the sidebar and notifications.

leaveInfo.title: Notice on leaving the Workspace
list: You are no longer participating in this workspace.
Data and records uploaded or shared by you will not be deleted. Leaving the Workspace was not successful.
If you would like to rejoin the Workspace contact the Workspace Master or manager again.
leaveInfo.agree: I agree to above guidelines before leaving the workspace.
leaveInfo.fail: Failed to leave the Workspace please try again later.

message.updateFail: Failed to setting up the Workspace details please try again later.

invite.invalid: Ask the Master to invite you again if you have been already refused to participate in a Workspace.

onpremiseSetting.title: Web service settings
onpremiseSetting.desc: Changing the favicon, logo and company name displayed on the web service. It does not apply to the installation programme (Application).

company.title: Change company name
company.desc: If you change the company name, you will displaying the account name instead of 'VIRNECT' in the Web Services tab / Service Title.
company.caution: Company name can be changed to a combination of Korean, English, Number, Special character (.,!,@,#,$,%,-,_,&) up to 20 characters.

logo.title: Change logo
logo.desc: If you wish to change a logo, please register a logo image. It will replace the VIRNECT logo from your web service.
logo.caution:
Upload JPG and PNG files up to 3MB.
* Recommended size: 170(horizontal) * 32(vertical, fixed)px / 72 DPI

favicon.title: Change favicon
favicon.desc: If you wish to change a favicon, please register a favicon image.
favicon.caution:
You can upload JPG and PNG files up to 3MB.
* Recommended size: 170(horizontal) * 32(vertical, fixed)px / 72 DPI

access.title: IP access control settings
access.error: This is an inaccessible IP address. Please contact the manager.

list.title: IP settings
list.warning: Please enter an IP address to allow access.

message.success: Successfully updated ip acceess control settings.

recording.title: Server record file deletion cycle
recording.desc: Set the deletion cycle of recorded files stored in the server.

attach.title: Attachment deletion cycle
attach.desc: Set the deletion cycle of attachments stored on the server.

upload.title: Upload install file

modal.title: Registering {n} installation file
modal.subTitle: File naming rules
modal.rule1: File names must start with an English letter, and only lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters (_) (.) can be used.
modal.rule2: Enter the file names in the order of {product}_{devicetype}_{versioncode}.{extension}.
modal.deviceType: deviceType: mobile, hololens2, linkflow, realwear, pc
modal.versionCode: versionCode:  Enter up to 7 digits in the order of major.minor.patch.optional.
modal.explanation: When the installation file upload is completed, an update notification window is created when the app is re-run.
modal.progressMessage:
The selected installation file is being uploaded.
Don't close your browser until done.

upload.success: The installation file has been uploaded.

error.fail: Failed to register installation file. Please try again after a while.
error.size: The file is not correct. Please check again.
error.name: The file name is not correct. Please check again.
error.version: The version of the attached file is low. Please check again.
error.lowVersion: Installation file version is lower then latest version duplicated.

delete.title: Delete download file
delete.desc: The uploaded file will be deleted and restored to the previous version. Do you want to delete?

appSetting.title: Application service settings​
appSetting.warning: You can upload PNG files up to 3MB.

remote.title: Change the Remote Application logo
remote.desc: If you wish to change a logo, please register a logo image. It will replace the VIRNECT logo from your app service.

type1.title: Android logo1
type1.caution:
You can upload PNG files up to 3MB.
* Recommended size
512(horizontal) * 512(vertical)px
* Background color
Transparent or RGB:17/21/44​

type2.title: Android logo2
type2.caution:
You can upload PNG files up to 3MB.
* Recommended size
776(horizontal) * 176(vertical)px
* Background color
Transparent or RGB:30/30/32

hololens2.title: HoloLens2 Logo
hololens2.caution:
You can upload PNG files up to 3MB.
* Recommended size
198(horizontal) * 56(vertical)px
* Background color
Transparent
